text:
Hey Guys, please i need some help

In a workflow, how can i use a filter on date that says "where date is x days lesser than another date field"?
Currently, i can only do something like "where date is x days from now" but not when i want to check it against another date field

Please help, thanks

Hey Cameron, I’ve let the team know this tooltip isn’t very helpful in this situation. Sorry for the slow response I had to do a lot of digging and asking around.

I think you would need to add columns to the left and right of the module to  create the margins you want for now or use a custom module - with fields to control the left and right margin.

The tooltip appears to be misleading.

Regardless we’re working on some things to make it easier to control the styling of modules in the page editor.
